div.div: Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 652 × 600 pixels. Other resolutions: 261 × 240 pixels | 522 × 480 pixels | 835 × 768 pixels | 1,113 × 1,024 pixels | 685 × 630 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 685 × 630 pixels, file size: 8 KB)

tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

table.style: border:2px solid #D3D3D3; width:100%; background-color:#F8F8F8; text-align:center; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this flag image:

div.a: Flag of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations Created by Josh Hoffer in 1912
Bandera de Rhode Island y plantaciones de Providence
Drapeau du Rhode Island et plantations de Providence

div.div: Français cadien: Flag du Rhode Island et plantations de Providence
Nedersaksies: Vlagge van Rhode Island en Providence Plantagen

div.a: Vlag van Rhode Island and Providence Plantations

div.div: Diné bizaad: Wóód Áalin Hahoodzo bidáh naat'á'i'
Српски / srpski: Zastava američke savezne države Rhode Island

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; text-align:center; margin:0.5em auto; border:1px solid #555555; background:#f6f7f5; direction:ltr;

td.i:
This image from the Xrmap flag collection (source: flags-2.6-src.tar.bz2).
The README file in that collection says of the SVG flags "We release them in the public domain".

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This work has been released into the public domain by its copyright holder, Xrmap. This applies worldwide.
td.small: In some countries this may not be legally possible; if so:
td.i: Xrmap grants anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

td.div: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

div.p: Derivative works of this file: Flag of Rhode Island 1882-1897.svg

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current19:30, 8 March 2019685 × 630 (8 KB)Thespoondragonmade it more clear that the fringe is fringe and not a gold border. see https://www.alamy.com/stock-photo-state-flag-the-state-house-in-providence-rhode-island-usa-124226937.html
21:32, 6 October 2017685 × 630 (7 KB)SimtropolitanReplaced text w/cleaner & more consistent glyphs
20:08, 4 September 2015685 × 630 (5 KB)SiBr4Code; dimensions based on http://sos.ri.gov/library/history/emblems/
00:43, 3 June 2011531 × 496 (23 KB)Fry1989trying PATH
00:39, 3 June 2011531 × 496 (30 KB)Fry1989it's true svg, so idk why it's "fuzzy", trying something to fi that, please work!
00:33, 3 June 2011531 × 496 (18 KB)Fry1989looks "Fuzzy", odd
00:31, 3 June 2011531 × 496 (18 KB)Fry1989alterations
04:25, 23 June 2010531 × 496 (18 KB)Zscout370Merge from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Usa_rhode_island.svg, text at http://www.ri.gov/facts/factsfigures.php and other state sites said fringe is a must.
20:39, 18 November 2009660 × 580 (12 KB)Zscout370too long length wise
20:35, 18 November 2009683 × 500 (11 KB)Zscout370To match state law
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
